Sentencas: Advanced technologies such as solid oxide fuel cells generally have a strict requirement on syngas quality especially the concentration of impurities.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: It is common to sacrifice economy and efficiency to achieve a qualified syngas by applying several cleaning and conditioning steps.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: The objective of this work is to propose a combined process by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit (SWU) to provide qualified syngas.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: The SWU includes supercritical water mixer, separator, supercritical water reactor (SWR) and expander.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Detailed operating methods and appropriate equipment are presented.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: The whole process is modeled by using Aspen Plus to investigate effects of SWR inlet temperature, operating pressure, and mass ratio of tars to supercritical water (T/W) on the final product composition and on the outlet temperature of SWR.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Results show that higher SWR inlet temperature facilitates achieving a higher H-2 and CO yield while lower inlet temperature assists in obtaining a higher H-2/CO ratio.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Lower SWR operating pressure benefits to achieve a higher H-2 and CO yield and a higher H-2/CO ratio.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Lower T/W benefits to have a higher H-2 yield and a lower CO yield, leading to a higher H-2/CO.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Tars could be completely decomposed at the given operating conditions in the proposed process.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Higher inlet temperature, higher pressure and larger T/W lead to an increased SWR outlet temperature.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters

Sentencas: Combustible components in the syngas mainly contains H-2, CO, and CH4.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas: Effects of operating parameters
